title: Bigg Boss 9 couple Keith Sequeira and Rochelle Rao might be seen on this reality show next : Top Stories, News - India Today
text:
Bigg Boss 9 couple Keith Sequeira and Rochelle Rao might be seen on this reality show next In an exclusive conversation with India Today Online, Keith Sequeira spills the beans on his upcoming projects. A + A - Keith Sequeira and Rochelle Rao. 
A year after his appearance on Bigg Boss 9, Keith Sequeira is finally making a comeback on TV, in fiction TV and hopefully in reality TV genre too. 
The actor and the reality TV contestant, in an exclusive conversation, revealed the details about his upcoming project--a fiction show--on Star Plus. 
"It's a really ambitious venture, produced by Alchemy Films, helmed by Sidharth Malhotra. I will be starring opposite Sanjeeda Shaikh, in this human drama series. It will have a lot of excitement, like there will be elements of a political drama as well as a love story. It will be an interesting pairing with Sanjeeda, and I am really looking forward to it," Keith told India Today Online. 
Also read: Bigg Boss 9 finalist Rochelle Rao has some important advice for BB 10 contestants 
Keith also opens about his character in the show. 
"My character is interesting. I come from a noble family. He has deep roots; also has that class. So yes, it's an interesting character," he said. 
Keith's new project will be launched in a month's time. 
"The full story is in place and the show will roll by the end of this month, or beginning next month." 
The show will also star veteran actress Anita Razdan. 
Apart from this project, Keith also admitted to have been approached for dancing reality show Nach Baliye with Rochelle Rao. 
Yes, it's true. I don't know how we are going to work out the dates. It's still under consideration. It is going to be time consuming. Let's see," he signed off. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
